messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] power of girls
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/24/2003 11:49:58 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... That IS cool! I say that s my middle name!  ~Kelly [Non-text portions of this message
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/24/2003 11:49:58 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
starsuncloud@... writes:


> Sierra picked up a line from the Madeline movie..."I can do anything", and
> I heard her saying it to herself a few times.
> When she really wanted to learn how to ride a bike last year, she got
> frustrated and I reminded her of the "I can do anything" phrase and suggested she
> repeat it to herself when the going got tough. I heard her muttering "I can do
> ANYthing" under her breath several times...she figured that durn bike out in
> two days. It was quite amazing.
> THat's her mantra now.
> Cool.
>

That IS cool! I say that's my middle name! <BWG>

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: power of girls
messages.msgSnippet: We can do it, Girls can do ANYTHING! and Carissa confidently added Yep, Girls are POWERFUL! I like this. Sierra picked up a line from the Madeline
messages.messageBody:
"We can do it, Girls can do ANYTHING!" and Carissa
confidently added "Yep, Girls are POWERFUL!"

I like this.

Sierra picked up a line from the Madeline movie..."I can do anything", and I heard her saying it to herself a few times.
When she really wanted to learn how to ride a bike last year, she got frustrated and I reminded her of the "I can do anything" phrase and suggested she repeat it to herself when the going got tough. I heard her muttering "I can do ANYthing" under her breath several times...she figured that durn bike out in two days. It was quite amazing.
THat's her mantra now.
Cool.

Ren
